short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple extension replaces the name Donald Trump with the more accurate Donald 'Racist bigot' Trump.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds the text "Donald Trump" in a website and replaces it with "Donald 'Racist bigot Trump" so you don't have to do it mentally everytime it appears online.
